Unsupervised Task

Source: R/TaskUnsupervised.R
TaskUnsupervised.Rd

This is the abstract base class for unsupervised tasks such as cluster tasks (not yet implemented).

See also

Other Task: TaskClassif, TaskRegr, TaskSupervised, Task, mlr_tasks_boston_housing, mlr_tasks_german_credit, mlr_tasks_iris, mlr_tasks_mtcars, mlr_tasks_pima, mlr_tasks_sonar, mlr_tasks_spam, mlr_tasks_wine, mlr_tasks_zoo, mlr_tasks

Super class

mlr3::Task -> TaskUnsupervised

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

TaskUnsupervised$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.

Examples

TaskUnsupervised$new("iris", task_type = "regr", backend = iris)
#> <TaskUnsupervised:iris> (150 x 5)
#> * Target: -
#> * Properties: -
#> * Features (5):
#>   - dbl (4): Petal.Length, Petal.Width, Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width
#>   - fct (1): Species
